title: why riot
body: i got the summoners icon but i didnt got your mystery gift or your RP i had that riot kayle skin long time ago so that means i need to get mystery gift or RP so riot i am waiting

replies.body: Gifts are still being sent out, and not everyone will get everything all at once.  Bookmark our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-) as we continue to update everyone on the progress so far.  Hang tight, and you'll get the goods!
